metadata.Title: CVE-2020-24616 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.6 mishandles the interactionbetween serialization gadgets and typing, related tobr.com.anteros.dbcp.AnterosDBCPDataSource (aka Anteros-DBCP).

criterions.comment: jackson-databind: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
